segments.text: I see this woman completely engrossed in a chore, unaware of how close she is to a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and it’s almost comical how she doesn’t seem to register it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water just keeps pouring over, and I can’t help but feel a pit in my stomach.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her indifference makes me feel frustrated; does she really not notice?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children, though, they’re in their own little world, planning their cookie caper.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is teetering on that stool, and I can’t look away, half-expecting him to topple.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is looking up at him with such earnestness, I find it oddly charming.
segments.speaker: PAR
